name: Herculoose: Damnation from the Underworld
description:
Hercules has slain Hades, and decided to carry his severed head to the surface, though not even the wisdom of Athena can explain why... As his trusted friend, you, Pegasus, must help him reach Olympus in one piece!

Hold A, to add left thrust and D to add right thrust. Let go of either to launch!

Tl:Dr: Think of Worms :3

Made by:

Tech Artist - Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen

Gameplay Programmer - Kit Valentin

Gameplay Programmer - Anton

Sound and 2D graphics - Alexandru
